name: paste-as-slack-mrkdwn
title: Paste as Slack Mrkdwn
description: Paste Markdown or rich text into Slack with proper formatting. Works great with content from ChatGPT, Notion, and other apps.
author: ryananderson

commands.name: paste-as-slack-mrkdwn
commands.title: Paste as Slack Mrkdwn
commands.description: Converts rich text or Markdown on the clipboard to Slack mrkdwn, pastes it and tells Slack to apply formatting.

preferences.name: autoFormat
preferences.label: Auto-format in Slack
preferences.title: Auto-format in Slack
preferences.description: Automatically apply Slack's formatting shortcut (Cmd+Shift+F) after pasting
